content.detailedDescription: I was out taking pictures of a dramatic lightening storm and caught a ufo descening out of thundercloud.
content.summary: Was taking pictures of lightening storm and caught ufo desending from thundercloud

content.detailedDescription: I was at work pulling a midnight shift, i had gone out for a smoke break at 3:30 am.  i had been out there for several minutes, i wasn't watching the clock, but i had only smoked about half of a cig. and star gazing as the stars were well visible that night.  i first saw the lights of a large airplane pass over at a high altitude from west (over the mississippi river)  moving toward the east.  the plane wasn't audible until it had dissapeared from my sight over the facility's roof.  about a minute later i noticed another object following the same trajectory as the plane, i first believed this to be another plane as commercial flights often pass over this area.  as the object moved closer, i noticed that the lights were not typical of the commercial planes i am familiar with. the lights seemed to blink red, blue, and yellow in a distinct pattern.  at this point i was thinking that it was just an odd plane, but when the object was directly over my head it simply dissappeared.  given that it is very dark here at this hour, i thought that perhaps a small random cloud had passed between my view and the object, so i continued to watch for it to reappear as the stars in the area i had seen the object dissappear were still well visible.  after several minutes with still no sound associated with this second object and no further sighting of it i heard a helicopter to the west.  i looked in that direction and saw a helicopter (obviously identifiable by the lights and sound).  the helicopter made a loop around the area i had seen the object dissapear in and then returned to the west, dissapearing behind the tree line.  growing up in atoka, tn very near the naval base at millington, i am quite accustomed to seeing various aircraft in the sky at all hours of the day and night.  we used to watch the air show from my front yard every year, but this was unlike anything i have ever seen, military or commercial.  i heard no reports on the local news about anything occurring, or being witnessed in the sky that night.  i don't know what it was, but it was strange and gave me a gooseflesh sensation (which i have rarely experienced since childhood). by the time i had returned inside, 20 minutes had passed.  i am not 100% on the date, it was early on a sunday morning in late july or early august.
content.summary: Blinking lights that abruptly dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: Driving on highway from el paso to carlsbad, we saw a bright light that looked like a sign.  as we got closed it started to change shapes. we finally were right next to it, i pulled to the side of the road. it was a reddish color. the light turned of as jerry got out of the care to take a picture. a white fog started to approach us, so i left as soon is i could. jerry and tanya seen multi lights turning in a circle, jerry started to take pictures and video. it stayed there for a moment then disappeared. all of us were scared, some were screaming.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen multi lights, disapered, fog shot out, lights again.

content.detailedDescription:
A co-worker and i were observing a hawk riding thermals just over our building in trevose, pa when suddenly, at the same time, we both noticed a shining silver object hovering some distance above the hawk. i would describe the object as looking like venus, maybe a bit larger. it was a mostly sunny day but with large fluffy clouds passing by. as one of these clouds moved in on the object you could see that the object was solid as it was just below the crest of the cloud. the object seemed stationary, but maybe spinning as it did flicker or lost its brightness as the cloud approched.

as the cloud overtook the object, the cloud itself seemed to slow down and accumulate where the oject was. after about five minutes of the cloud accumulating in that one spot it finally moved on and the object was gone.
content.summary: Round silver/white object stationary in sky lower than passing clouds

content.detailedDescription: I looked out of our clearstory window (smaller window, usually above a main window, and doesn���t have blinds) at 9:58 pm right before i was about to put my book down and try to get to asleep and saw a quick blinking star like light (looked like firework or sparkler type but did not fade, no noise, and was more random than a firework could ever be) that was rapidly moving in a ridged movement for about 40 seconds. i woke my husband who was able to see this for about 15 seconds until we could not see it through our window anymore. at that point we both got out of bed and looked out the window to see where it went, we did not see that rapidly blinking start light again but saw approximately 6-8 white blinking lights that formed a circle (looked as if it was the size of our development or bigger, huge craft). we considered the option of it being planes but there was no red light on another wing, they were all moving in formation, and it wouldn���t explain the blinking light. it did sound like 5 planes were going over our house (subtle but noticeable) but it made more of a hovering sound rather than plans and continued until we saw it slowly move to the east. that was the last we saw of it until we couldn���t see anymore because of the slight precipitation in the air. i can���t think of anything else that would explain this encounter and have never seen a ufo in my life. i have seen plenty of planes and it was not that, my husband works at an airport so he knows it wasn���t as well.
content.summary: Quick blinking star light and huge disc above firestone

content.detailedDescription: I have seen it several times before this one, but i recently heard about being able to report ufos through a hotline or on mufon, and decided to report it! it is always the same thing but in different spots above my house. it will sometimes go south to north and other times west to east or vice versa! the only way i can describe it is that it truly is a u.F.O. to me because i'm not saying it's an alien starship, but it is unidentified to me and there are no f.A.A. regulation lights on it! it seems to be just a moving star and my mom has seen it as well!! the object just seems to float in mid-air miles above our house. it will look like a shining, bright star in the nighttime sky, but then we will see it moving at a slow pace. it flashes real bright sometimes but only when i look at it, because i have told my mom and she hasn't seen it flash yet. after it flashes real bright, it will appear as a normal star but it is moving and it gets dimmer and dimmer untill you can't see it anymore!! i'm not sure what it is but i see it alot and my sister-in-law said it could be a satellite but i heard they only move south to north?? this one that i have seen moves in all directions and makes no noise at all!! it also seems to disappear right in front of your eyes?? so to whomever is reading this report, if you have any information about what this object is please contact me and relieve my curiousity!!! i know i didn't leave any contact info in this report, but i'm sure someone out there knows how to find me and get in touch?? well thanks for taking the time to read this!!! and one last note this isn't a hoax i am dead serious and i would like to know what this object is thanks!!
content.summary: It was like a moving star

content.detailedDescription: Same area as always.  there are 3 objects in air on first two photos and one hovering or nestled in trees on left of photo...Close up of it in photo number 3.
content.summary: More ufo's over the same area of trees in pearisburg

content.detailedDescription: Once again another series of photos from the same area of pearisburg, virginia
content.summary: Ufo over trees (same area as last year)

content.detailedDescription:
Located in the city of chicago around 4200north/800west i was sitting in my apartment that has a window facing west. from this window which is on the 7th floor and completely unobstructed i saw a large bright white object very low and sitting stationary in the sky. this object was not there earlier in the evening nor was it there yesterday. i thought maybe it was a planet because it was so large,low and bright. as i saw this object just sit in the sky,it also did not have any faa lights, windows, noise, markings, structure, it did not move, pulsate or blink. the skies were clear and the object from my point of view was that of a large beachball. it was close in my line of sight from my apartment maybe 1/2 mile out and it was near a brick tower as a point of reference.

while this object sat in the sky for at least 20 minutes in the same spot there was alot of aircraft traffic heading towards ohare airport. coming from the south were planes one by one flying underneath and past this object. also in the farther distance you could see the aircraft in the waitng line with them stacked in the sky.

then after about 20 mintutes of watching this bright white stationary object it turned into a different color, it turned a deep cherry red, with orange and purple hues. when it started changing colors it started moving in the same spot it looked like a shelled peanut shape. it looked like it twisted in the spot into these colors without changing it original location in the sky. as it changed into these colors and shape it started moving ever so slowly to the right a couple feet and stopped for a minute or so. regular aircraft traffic was still heavy with the same patterns going on.

 after about a minute or so this red object slowly starting moving staight west still in the same low tragectory towards ohare airport. this red hued object was not blinking or flashing. it was just a red/orange/purple ball of light moving. it took about 10 mintues for what looked like it was right over the airport and then past the horizon. all the while, i could see all the regular air traffic going in and landing. this object from my point of view seemed to be in the middle of all this air traffic.
content.summary: Large bright white stationary planet - like object turns deep red and slowly moves due west

content.detailedDescription:
Before i submit this let me begin by saying i am of sound mind.I'm not some kind of nutjob.

i live in southern illinois within the salem,mt. vernon,centralia,nashville area.On approximately 8/26/08 there was a crescent moon that particular evening.It was after midnight.I went outside because it was rather nice out and looked up toward the moon.As i was looking up i saw "something" coming into my scope of view heading directly from the west heading easterly.I have always been fascinated by flight since i was a child and i have no idea what this "thing" was.It appeared as though it was at about 10,000-12,000 feet in altitude,was a luminescent almost transparent color of greyish white,crescent shaped and appeared to be about the 100 yards across.As it traveled toward the light of the moon it had what i could only describe as a feathery appearance between the outward edges of whatever it was.And no,it was not a bird.It was moving a very high rate of speed.Not extremely fast,but at a very good clip.I continued watching this "thing" move toward the light of the moon and once it reached the aura of the light of the moon...Poof...It was gone.The thing about my sighting was how smooth and fluid like its movement was.It was amazing to behold.I don't know what it was,but it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen in my entire life.

the one thing that really puzzled me was the feathery appearance between the outside edges as it moved across the sky.Propulsion signature,preparing to cloak?Very puzzling!!
content.summary: White luminescent boomerang shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Well i was sitting outside in my terris watching t.V. at night about 11:00 pm or 11:15 pm. and i saw a big flash in the sky, like lighting but not lighting.I looked in the flash of light and all i saw was a big flash in sky and all the flash of light got like sucked in to a big moon like shape and moved away like at the speed of light.And in a matter of seconds it was gone no sound no nothing. i thought it was like a star falling but it was to big, not on fire ,like some commet's or shooting star ,but no it was all white like the moon, same shape.It was crazy...I was kinda mad cuz my wife did'ent see it. she just saw the flash. but my neighbor saw it to he was driving comeing home around the same time....
content.summary: A big flash in the night cloudy sky. it lit the whole sky for like 1 sec,or 2 .

content.detailedDescription:
Being the sole competent witness of this event, my elderly mother in law requested i file this report on her behalf. she would do so herself if her vision were better. 
  the siting occurred on a clear summer night in either 1957 or 1958. she, her husband, their two young children,her husband's sister and sister's husband were returning from a drive in movie. 
  at the in-laws home, as everyone started to exit the parked car, she glanced over the house toward the open fields and saw what she thought was a blimp trying to land. she shouted to the others to look. 
  it was then that they all realized that it wasn't a blimp. based on the tree-line behind the field they  estimated that it was a disk shaped craft 100 feet wide, hovering about 100 ft above the field at a distance of less than 200 ft away. it had a even spacing of lights in its middle with no visible windows or sound. 
  they all quickly ran into the house and hid the children in the bedroom. when the men went back outside a few minutes later the craft was gone. they agreed never to speak of this with anyone including their families, and they didn't. they children, now in their 50's, were young and don't remember the event. 
  the current location puts the craft's position n/west of the "bobby chez seafood restaurant" on hurffville-cross keys road, sewell (gloucester county) , n.J.   the field was located, on the west side of the road an equal distance from the restaurant and the cross keys bypass.
content.summary: Hovering 100 feet above a field behind house.

content.detailedDescription:
The first object i saw (approx 4pm est) was when i was coming from my back yard to the front yard (west to east)and i happened to look up to see a white orb about 500' up moving east with lightning fast speed zoom across the sky and just before it went out of sight it split into two orbs moving away from one another at a 45 degree angle. 

10 min later while coming out of my basement door i looked up again to see 4 white orbs in a "missing man" boomerang formation heading west and they just faded from view, they just vanished into thin air and not by shooting out of view - they just disappeared. 

i live directly under the approach path to logan airport (east of my location) in central mass (templeton, ma). 

they were just pure white orbs and they were not convention aircraft in any way. this is my first ever sighting of an aerial anomoly. i took no photos of the sighting.
content.summary: Saw white orbs in formation + saw orb split into two

content.detailedDescription:
Sameas above...May have been moon distorted by clouds...But before moon rise i think

back porch walking dog...It was bigger than two fingers at arms length
it was hovering

i tried to find out if i was seeing the moon to no avail was moon out at 2 a.M.

i have seen moving objects doing unusual things before but not this big
it may have been the moon distorted by clouds but the paper says the moon was not in the sw

i moved to ky five months ago and never have seen clear skys before...
if it wasn't the moon i'm amazed.  it was due s west...We have a military tower close by

it finally was obscured by clouds

please keep me anonymous
content.summary: In s eastern sky while walking dog  looked big

content.detailedDescription: It was 9:15 and i was looking up at the sky when i noticed a real bright star like light that i knew wasn't there from before then it started to slowly move and was bright as can be it's so strange on what they do they come out of no where and they stand in one place and as your eye's are in tuned onto them it's like they know you are looking and they start to move like to what i could see they are floating through air and they get dimmer and dimmer as you are watching them this light was heading north and seen in the same spot to were i've seen it before then a couple of minutes after seeing it a second one under the big dipper appeared and did the same thing i know what i'm seeing and what ever they are i know deep with in my mind it's not  plane's or star's they just show up out of no where they kind of look like a flair type light but moving so slow and fading away as if they don't want to be seen my friend from ohio had told me to report everyone that i see and i'm going to start reporting his sightings as well from what he's been seeing off of east lake ohio, we keep in contact due to what we are seeing i live on a hill in pa, and i have a clear shot of the sky i don't see them every night but gite often and i don't chose to look for ufo's but they are making their self's known
content.summary: I was out on my front porch when i noticed  star's that looked brighter then normel

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette looking up as usual, and sighted a star like object around 9:50 moving south east right above me. it was very high and slightly dimmer than most other stars. i kept looking and sighted another one(starlike as well) going north west. and again one moving south again. it could have been the same thing, but they all seemed to fade. lasted per sighting about 40 seconds a piece. and then to top it all off i came back out to watch the skies again around 10:25, and sighted three starlike ufos in a triangle formation. i've seen these before, this one was moving steadily south and eventually slowed and faded. the triangle held its formation very tightly, and eventually faded after it had slowed down. the triangle sighting lasted about 3 minutes.
content.summary: Triangle formation up high in the atmosphere. and 3 other starlike moving stedily in different directions

content.detailedDescription: On sept. 3, 2008, i was with camping with 4 other men in parkside bay on ragged lake, in algonquin provincial park. (near smoke lake sighting on aug. 19, 2008) i had awakened at 4:30 am, (reason unknown), and had made coffee over the fire. while it was cooking, i walked down to the lake to look at the stars since the sun had not come up yet. as i looked to the south, (approximately 1/2 mile away), i noticed a large, bright, multiple colored, (red, blue, green, yellow, purple, with varying location), sphere shaped object flashing right on the treeline. this object spanned the width of at least 6 large pine trees directly below it. (i could see them silouetted below the object). i did not have a camera but my binoculars were in the canoe so i grabbed them to take a closer look. the object was definitely sphere shaped with alternating color patterns. as i watched, it arose and lowered in the sky, but never below the tree line. after about an hour it rose to a height of 100 to 150 feet above the trees but did not get smaller or travel along the trees in any direction. initially, i thought the object was an airplane or helicopter but soon realized there was no sound at all and the changes in the lights were not consistent with aircraft. after another 5 to 10 minutes i heard an airplane off to the west of the lake, at cruising altitude, moving much faster and much smaller than the object i was observing. the plane was gone from my sight within 5 minutes but the object remained for at least another 20 to 25 minutes without moving in any direction. i continued watching until faded from view with the lightening sky. during and after the sighting i felt i was watching some type of ufo and after speaking to a few people about it, i still feel i was being visited or observed for some reason. in addition, after relating this to my wife, she went on to the mufon site and we read about another similar sighting which took place north of smoke lake on aug. 19, 2008 at 10:14 pm. the reporters description seems to be very similar to my own in every way except duration. these two locations are relatively close to each other. within 10 miles. i would welcome contact from mufon as well as the other individual who had a sighting from this area to exchange information.
content.summary: Varying multi colored, sphere shaped, hovering object above tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
On a cloudy, rainy night, at around 8:20pm on tuesday, september 9th, 2008 i went for a quick drive to wal-mart to pick up some school supplies. i drove down woodsom farm in amesbury, a large field with hills and maybe 4 or 5 houses, which isn't too far from my house. it takes a couple minutes to fully drive down the farm, i had my windows open and was listening to a cd with decent volume. i looked to my left, where there are no houses and a clear view of a large field, when i saw four balls of green light hovering in the sky, each crisscrossing each other in a big circle. 
i remembered seeing those exact things about a year ago when me and my mother were driving down that same road, we even stopped the car i think to watch them. 
i turned off the music in my car and called my mother on my cell phone, all the while watching those odd beams of light moving in the sky. they didn't look like they were just hovering over one spot in the field, they were clearly moving along the road at around the speed i was going in my car (about 30 mph). my mom didn't answer her phone, but i still kept an eye on the lights. i forgot about the lights after i drove down the farm and got on the main road, route 110, however i took a left heading towards seabrook, nh i noticed out of the corner of my eye the same balls of dim green light. they appeared to have followed me, gliding along maybe 50 feet in the air, circling around each other. 
at that point i was a little freaked out, since the last time i saw them with my mother, we didn't see them again that night. i called my mom again, hoping to reach her this time, when she finally answered i told her about them and rolled up my windows in my car. they followed me right into seabrook but when i pulled into the wal-mart parking lot, they were gone, they seemed to have just vanished in the sky. i don't know what they could have been, but it was definitely an odd sight.
content.summary: Four dim balls of green light

content.detailedDescription:
We left denver co.Around 9am, hoping to arrive in midland tex. by midnight. my daughter karen who was 17 at the time, jay a friend of ours and me brenda the driver. i have made this many times.If you have ever driven hyw349s from lamesa to midland texas you would dicover a worn out 2 lane highway,for as the senery, well there is none unless you like mesquite,cacti,and of course lots and lots of horney toads. it is about a 60 mile stretch from lamesa to midland. around 11pm mountain time (car clock)we were going about 80 mi hr. when the car began to viberate and jerk, karen began to hollar "pull over there is something wrong with the car!" i quickley looked down at the gauges, the clock read 11pm andthe other gauges read normal. i looked up and everything was lit up by a brillant blue light. a colbat blue or the blue on a gas flame. i looked to the right (west) there it was, a circluar disk (like a plate turned upside down) red white and blue lights spun around in a uncounter clock way around the disc.The disc was silvery,no noise what so ever. all of a sudden it shot over the car to the east then in a split second it was behind us.The next thing i remember karen screaming (go go go!!!!!)she was terrified.Idon"t remember ever pulling the car over but here we are in a ditch with the cacti.I really had to punch the gas pedal to get up the incline of the ditch.I looked at the gauges the clock still read 11 but the radio said it was 12:30 (that was texas time) my car clock should have read 11:30 but read 11. i guess i began to panic i kept repeating did you see it, did you see it, what do we do, what do we do!!!!!!!
i wanted to call some one yea right who in the hell would believe us. we were 30 miles from midland when our incounter happened, 30 miles to go.
we got to midland told everyone in the household, their response (yea right.)karen,jay and i needed to get some rest for in 5 hrs we had to head back to colorado. oh i forgot about jay, he slept through it all! 
karen and i did not get any sleep she was sick at her stomach and i was trying to warm myself with a small heating pad.I was so cold i could not quit shaking,it felt like my body was in shock. 
two odd things i can't explain!
1. my wrist watch stopped at 11 too and never worked again.
2. the car's electrical system never worked properly again. try driving at night and your car lights go off and you have to wait for daybreak to continue drivig. needless to say the car was sold!!

thanks for listening,
brenda 












j
content.summary: Traveling from co. to tx. spotted lamesa tx. circluar disc lost 20min of time

content.detailedDescription:
Two triangle patterns of discs, one in the middle desended in a "flutter" pattern leaving the two triangle patterns. when an aircraft approx 20k heading west came into view they went into a straight line of 5 heading approx ne to sw with one on the east side mid line. after the plane past the area they went back to two triangle patterns.
we saw three into one on easter at the approx same location. this was sun. 1500 on the end of sba breakwater, my wife and grandson also saw them. after approx 10 minutes they departed from view. no fear having seen the likes before.
content.summary: Seven discs

content.detailedDescription: Northbound on my way to deliver meals-on-wheels at 11:30 a.M., i pulled up to a stop sign at an intersection, saw car in middle of road with 3 men in it, which had evidently come from the east, and one of them was leaning through driver's window aiming a white camera with a very long lens (about 1 to 1 1/2 feet long)at something. when i looked in that direction i at first thought it was an airplane he was filming, but as it tilted i saw it was a disk with a bubble on both the top and bottom some distance away, perhaps about 3 miles at about 20-30 degrees up from the horizon. to me, it seemed about the size of a twin-engine cessna. i became a bit apprehensive when one of the men glared at me, so after about 5 seconds i pulled away from my stop sign and went on my way.  i saw in my rear view mirror as i headed on north that the 3 men in the car had now turned south.  i'm puzzled as to how these men knew about this object.
content.summary: Daylight disk, saw 3 men in a car filming it from intersection where i'd stopped

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house when i decided to go until the yard, i looked at for the sky and i sighted a strange object, at the first moment i found that it was an airplane, but looked at and vi intently that he could not be because the object if put into motion very slowly, was not a helicopter, if the press was a meteor would speak, but this did not happen. the object age of golden color, had an average size in the front and a round format, in the way and behind had a tail. i was in the yard to see what it went to happen, the object was putting into motion and lost each time but clearness until it disappeared. other people also they capsize. i am convinced that object was not a way of conventional transport, was very strange.
content.summary: An object only, in the form of missel, color gold.Walked very slowly and the sky was becoming increasingly less clear and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: In late june 2008 while walking my dog "jake" at approximately 8:45 pm i looked up at the early evening sky. it had rained and i wanted to see if it was still overcast guessing at whether it might rain again or perhaps in the morning.I saw a streak of light in the western sky and had thought at first it was a bolt of lightning. however as i continued to view the growing darkness of night i realized that there were lines of light that simultaneously came out of each direction--north, south, east and west; met in the northern sky spun in a clockwise direction three or four times and then each went back from where they came to start the dance in the twilight over again.These "lights" were not saucer or cylinder shape they were "globes" of intensely bright white light. as they traveled from each direction bright white light trailed behind them. when they met and spun they appeared to look like four "ying and yang" shapes.I live about one to one and a half miles away from several car dealerships which are in the north and i thought to myself that perhaps it was a laser light show used as an advertising tool. waterbury, connecticut is known for its steep hills and valleys so to me it seemed impossible as each globe went to the north south east and west as far as the eye could see; if it was a laser show a hill or valley would get in the way stopping me from seeing its straight continuous path.These "globes" traveled faster than any plane, helicopter or jet that i have ever witnessed in my fifty plus years.I do not drink alcohol and i do not take any illegal substances i was not sleeping before i took my dog outside so i wasn't dreaming. i have never seen anything like this. my one regret is that i didn't have my camera phone with me as this sighting lasted more then ten minutes and i could have gotten some great shots.  as quickly as they appeared they disappeared silently again to the north south east and west.  since i witnessed this in june (2008) several other people have come forward to claim that they've seen similar "lights" have called the police and have even made it to the waterbury republican newspaper.If there is an explanation for this i would sure like to hear it....Since then....I go nowhere without my camera phone!
content.summary: Four bright white silent spheres

content.detailedDescription: My son and myself where returning from jacksonville traveling on i4 at the 75 junction at around 3:30pm . the craft with no wings or tail noticable was above the tampa international airport it looked larger than comercial aircraft frissbee shape with a slightly reflective almost see through look plus partly cloudy at the time sky was blue where the object was. my son told me he saw exactlly what i was looking at. and it wasn't there a minute later as i almost wrecked trying to take sharp turn and keep my eyes on it after the turn we could not see it anywhere, we saw planes further and closer and you could see wings and tails on all them. now my son believes in ufo's myself included
content.summary: Longer than a large comercial airline twice as high almost see through look to it slightly gray.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my living room in coquitlam facing towards golden ears in maple ridge, and in the corner of my eye, i saw a very bright object coming up from behind the mountains as if it was like someone was taking a metal object and reflecting the shine into my eyes. so i got up to look out the window, and it slowly rose higher and higher, still shining very bright. it was about the size of a star, and then doubled in size. after that for about a minute, it got very small and vanished. i waited about 5 minutes while calling my friend who lives down the street to look outside only to see it come out of the same spot again, from behind the mountains. i was thinking it could be an airplane, but it would not have vanished like that, and be in the same position as it was before. we were both looking at it from our houses when it vanished again, this time not doubling in size. for a third time, it popped up from the mountains again, and started moving to the left, looking like it was curving towards us, and also flying higher, then it vanished. after that, she went to go look for her binoculars, and a fourth time it popped out of the mountains. this time was the weirdest because i watched it for about 5 minutes as it slowly creeped to the right of the mountains (mind you it is still very high up from the mountains) and it started to dim to a very dark orange colour. as it looked like a very bright star before (still light out at this time), it was now a dark orange sphere and it kept floating towards the right. after that i did not see it anymore. 

another thing is, between the months of july-present, my friend and i (and alot of other people) have also seen star looking shapes in the sky, that blink red and green very fast. i am actually currently looking at one right now. i am just wondering if there are any explanations for these sightings or if anyone has seen the same thing around the lowermainland.
content.summary: Very weird bright light coming from behind the mountains and slowly moving

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling out of my driveway,heading towards the grocery store.Im always looking towards the sky and have spotted objects that i could not identify on a few occasions.It was a rather overcast night(near dusk)and the clouds were quite low.As i was driving i noticed two bright amber colored lights moving from west to east,i observed this or these objects from my car for approx 1 minute,what caught my attention was the lack of runner lights.I pulled over in front of our corner bank and got out of my car.The object move across the the sky at a good rate(hard to estimate,but not a ballon,at least several hundred miles an hour)and disappeared into the horizon.Im not sure,but the lights seemed to be one craft.This is my first time reporting any sighting,but i have witnessed several of these objects since febuary 08,and also,objects that seem to mimic stars,but then fade in and out,not due to cloud cover.I own my own company and i work outdoors in the middle of the night.I have noticed a dramatic increase lately,and i would like to hear from anyone in this area who has experienced the same.Thank you john s
content.summary: Two amber colored lights,fairly low alltitude,as they were beneath the dark clouds at dusk.Seemed to be one object and moving at a considerable rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were leaving our apartment and walked to the garage, where i noticed a star or planet near the moon. i pointed the moon out to my daughter and told her that it might be jupiter near the moon, but i didn't know how accurate that was. we were facing the south and i pointed out what i believed to be sirius, blazing brightly. i then turned around and faced north and saw an identical star blazing out of place. it was bright, unmoving, and steady. it was at roughly the same angle in the sky as "sirius", only directly opposite and in the northern sky. i thought that it might be a plane, but it was not following any standard approach, nor was it moving, but i figured that might be simply due to my angle and it could be moving roughly in my direction. then, it started to moved either downward or farther north. i could not be certain because it seemed to drift slowly, but the light was fading very quickly. within only a few seconds it had dimmed out completely, moving only a degree, maybe two, in my field of vision. when the light had dimmed, i noticed no blinking lights, red and blue lights, or in fact any other light that i would expect to see on an aircraft. it simply faded. there was no sound of a jet, prop engine, or helicopter, or any other sound for that matter. the light was white and faded out in the same color. the event lasted only 15 seconds at most, but was a little eerie as i didn't have time to analyze all the information before it was over.
content.summary: Very bright misplaced star hovered then moved and quickly faded.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the cliff on west cliff dr. next to my taxi, over looking the monterey bay when a dark airborne craft flew from over the bay to the unincorperated area of live oak near the radio towers of ksco at 24th ave. i was observing from a mile away in clear sky. the event lasted two or more seconds. as the craft neared the shore, the city lights reflected off the leading edge of the disc object, or the craft blinked it's front lights over one fourth of it's circumference. it was moving at 2-3 hundred mi.Per hour, at a steady altitude of 800 feet. it then went stealth and disappeared.
content.summary: No lights, dark until city lights reflected off leading edge. 100-150 ft. in diameter. thicker in the middle than edges. disk shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside from the barn to the house and noticed a bright object in the southern sky - brighter than a star.  it caught my eye because it was lower to the horizon and brighter than stars are in my area.  as i watched longer it seemed to change colors from green to white to red to white to orange, etc.  at this time i stopped walking and watched some more.  i thought maybe it was an aircraft approaching but it didn't get any closer or seem to change in position relative to the horizon like approaching aircraft do.  it seemed to be hovering - not moving left or right or toward me.  it also seemed be oscillating up and down slowly.  it wasn't making big movements, but rather small.  at this point i really thought my eyes were playing tricks on me in the darkness and that thing really couldn't be moving only up and down.  i had been watching for maybe a few minutes at this point.  i went inside to get my wife to look at it also, to make sure i wasn't just "seeing things". i took her out on the front porch and asked her to look in the direction of the light, without telling her what to look for.  she immediately noticed it and i prompted her to further describe to me what she was seeing.  she said that it was moving up and down and changing colors.  after about another 3-4 minutes it seemed to slowly move to the east and then it seemed to be moving north toward our house.  within 30 seconds or so we could start to see flashing lights on the object.  as it got closer, i could see a white flashing light on one side and a steady red light near the rear.  it started to look like an airplane (delta shape) but it was getting pretty close and i still didn't hear the engines.  eventually, it flew to the east of our house at an altitude of maybe 2000-3000 ft. and seemed to be traveling about the speed of commercial aircraft normally seen in our area.  i eventually heard the sound of a gas turbine engine but it was quieter than most commercial aircraft.  from the time it started to no longer hover until it passed by our house was probably about one minute.  i think this might have been an airplane but the hovering in one place for almost ten minutes and the oscillating movement lead me to believe otherwise.  i figured i'd report it anyway, though.
content.summary: Hovering light in distance, changing colors and oscillating up and down, then flew toward house - aircraft-like

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my  car  in a parking lot waiting for my son to come out of day care, my car was facing south. i was staring at the sky because there were very lite or transparent clouds covering the brightness of the sun so i was able to stare at the sun without it hurting my eyes. all of a sudden from behind some dark clouds that were to the right of me a perfectly shaped triangle was traveling  from west to east, it had to be about  2 or so miles away from me very large in size, solid color no lights or markings were visible, like i said it  came out from behind a large group of clouds traveled east and went behind another group of clouds. no sound was heard and it didnt make any strange movements or flight patterns , just smooth and quiet..The  object was visible for about 10 seconds and at arms length i  would need an 8 by 10 sheet of paper to cover it..All of my life i have experienced many strange things but for some reason this incident really scared the hell out of me.
content.summary: I saw a black triangle flying from one part of the sky to another
